attributes.action: Make all meat and dairy products free range and make stricter guidelines on free range food.
attributes.additional_details:
Make it the law for all meat and dairy products to be free range and make stricter guidelines on free range food such as:
-the animals should have to be outside for a large part of the day (rather than just being able to see daylight).
-strict guidelines on how the animals are killed so that they suffer as little as possible.
